EmailTemplate.name: 202002_Americas_GH_ROS-HGuide-whitepaper_Linkedin-Paid.ROS Whitepaper Hguide N58
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Copy of “How to Enhance Point Clouds Using Honeywell's HGuide n580” is ready!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you!
Here is your copy of “How to Enhance Point Clouds Using Honeywell's HGuide n580” <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_IMU_ROS-Hguide-n580-Whitepaper.pdf]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
For companies in surveying and mapping, generating accurate point clouds is critical when creating mapping systems. Creating them real-time reduces the overhead needed in post-processing and opens new possibilities for the final application.
In this study, we identify how customers can easily create accurate point clouds in real-time using our HGuide n580 inertial navigation system (INS/GNSS) in combination with one or more sensors on a computer running the robotic operating system (ROS).
If you'd like to receive newsletters, product information and special offers from our HGuide team, please opt-in here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HGuide-sign-up.html]]>.
Best,
The HGuide Support Team Download My Whitepaper <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_IMU_ROS-Hguide-n580-Whitepaper.pdf]]>
